content: 1 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses､ in the desert of Sinai､ in the tent of meeting,—on the first of the second month､ in the second year､ by their coming forth out of the land of Egypt､ saying:
content_old: 1 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses､ in the desert of Sinai､ in the tent of meeting,—on the first of the second month､ in the second year､ by their coming forth out of the land of Egypt､ saying:

content: 2 Reckon ye up the sum of all the assembly of the sons of Israel, by their families､ by their ancestral houses,—in the counting of names, every male､ by their polls;
content_old: 2 Reckon ye up the sum of all the assembly of the sons of Israel, by their families､ by their ancestral houses,—in the counting of names, every male､ by their polls;

content: 3 from twenty years old and upwards, every one able to go forth to war､ in Israel,—ye shall number them by their hosts､ thou and Aaron;
content_old: 3 from twenty years old and upwards, every one able to go forth to war､ in Israel,—ye shall number them by their hosts､ thou and Aaron;

content: 4 and with you shall be one man for each tribe,—each man head of his ancestral house shall be.
content_old: 4 and with you shall be one man for each tribe,—each man head of his ancestral house shall be.

content: 5 These､ then､ are the names of the men who shall stand with you,— Of Reuben Elizur､ son of Shedeur;

content: 11 Of Benjamin Abidan､ son of Gideoni;

content: 12 Of Dan Ahiezer､ son of Ammishaddai;

content_old: 15 Of Naphtali Ahira､ son of Enân.

content: 16 These are they who had been summoned by the assembly, being princes of the tribes of their fathers,—heads of the thousands of Israel.
content_old: 16 These are they who had been summoned by the assembly, being princes of the tribes of their fathers,—heads of the thousands of Israel.

content: 17 So then Moses and Aaron took these men, who were distinguished by name;
content_old: 17 So then Moses and Aaron took these men, who were distinguished by name;

content: 18 all the assembly also called they together､ on the first of the second month,—and they declared their pedigree according to their families､ by their ancestral houses,—in the counting of names､ from twenty years old and upwards､ by their polls.
content_old: 18 all the assembly also called they together､ on the first of the second month,—and they declared their pedigree according to their families､ by their ancestral houses,—in the counting of names､ from twenty years old and upwards､ by their polls.

content: 19 As Yahweh commanded Moses so he mustered them in the desert of Sinai.
content_old: 19 As Yahweh commanded Moses so he mustered them in the desert of Sinai.

content: 20 And they were as followeth—The sons of Reuben､ the firstborn of Israel, in their pedigrees—by their families､ by their ancestral houses,—in the counting of names､ by their polls, every male､ from twenty years old､ and upwards, every one able to go forth to war;

content: 44 These are they who were numbered､ whom Moses and Aaron､ and the twelve princes of Israel did number, the princes acting each one for his ancestral house.

content: 45 So then all they who were numbered of the sons of Israel､ by their ancestral houses,—from twenty years old､ and upwards, every one able to go forth to war in Israel;

content_old: 46 so then all they who were numbered were six hundred and three thousand､ and five hundred and fifty.

content: 47 But the Levites､ by the tribe of their fathers were not numbered in their midst.
content_old: 47 But the Levites､ by the tribe of their fathers were not numbered in their midst.

content: 48 For Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 48 For Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:

content: 49 Only the tribe of Levi shalt thou not number, nor the sum of them shalt thou reckon up,—in the midst of the sons of Israel.
content_old: 49 Only the tribe of Levi shalt thou not number, nor the sum of them shalt thou reckon up,—in the midst of the sons of Israel.

content: 50 But do thou thyself put the Levites in charge over the habitation of the testimony､ and over all the furniture thereof､ and over all that pertaineth thereto, they shall bear the habitation､ and all the furniture thereof, and they shall attend thereupon; and round about the habitation shall they encamp.
content_old: 50 But do thou thyself put the Levites in charge over the habitation of the testimony､ and over all the furniture thereof､ and over all that pertaineth thereto, they shall bear the habitation､ and all the furniture thereof, and they shall attend thereupon; and round about the habitation shall they encamp.

content: 51 And when the habitation is to set forward the Levites shall take it down, and when the habitation is to be pitched the Levites shall set it up,—but the stranger that draweth near shall be put to death.
content_old: 51 And when the habitation is to set forward the Levites shall take it down, and when the habitation is to be pitched the Levites shall set it up,—but the stranger that draweth near shall be put to death.

content: 52 So then the sons of Israel shall pitch their tents,—every man near his own camp､ and every man near his own standard､ by their hosts;
content_old: 52 So then the sons of Israel shall pitch their tents,—every man near his own camp､ and every man near his own standard､ by their hosts;

content: 53 but the Levites shall pitch their tents round about the habitation of the testimony, that there be no wrath upon the assembly of the sons of Israel,—so shall the Levites keep the watch of the habitation of the testimony.
content_old: 53 but the Levites shall pitch their tents round about the habitation of the testimony, that there be no wrath upon the assembly of the sons of Israel,—so shall the Levites keep the watch of the habitation of the testimony.

content: 1 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses and unto Aaron､ saying:
content_old: 1 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses and unto Aaron､ saying:

content: 2 Every man—near his standard､ with the ensigns belonging to their ancestral houses shall the sons of Israel encamp,—at a distance round about the tent of meeting shall they encamp.
content_old: 2 Every man—near his standard､ with the ensigns belonging to their ancestral houses shall the sons of Israel encamp,—at a distance round about the tent of meeting shall they encamp.

content: 3 And they who encamp eastwards､ towards sunrise shall be the standard of the camp of Judah､ by their hosts,—even the prince of the sons of Judah, Nashôn､ son of Amminadab;
content_old: 3 And they who encamp eastwards､ towards sunrise shall be the standard of the camp of Judah､ by their hosts,—even the prince of the sons of Judah, Nashôn､ son of Amminadab;

content: 4 and his host､even they who are numbered of them,—seventy-four thousand､ and six hundred.
content_old: 4 and his host､even they who are numbered of them,—seventy-four thousand､ and six hundred.

content_old: 6 and his host､ even they who are numbered of them,—fifty-four thousand､ and four hundred.

content: 16 All they who are numbered to the camp of Reuben,—a hundred and fifty-one thousand､ and four hundred and fifty, by their hosts and they in the second rank shall set forward.

content: 17 Then shall set forward the tent of meeting—the camp of the Levites､ in the midst of the camps,—as they encamp so shall they set forward, every man at the side thereof､ by their standards.
content_old: 17 Then shall set forward the tent of meeting—the camp of the Levites､ in the midst of the camps,—as they encamp so shall they set forward, every man at the side thereof､ by their standards.

content_old: 18 The standard of the camp of Ephraim, by their hosts､ westwards,—even the prince of the sons of Ephraim, Elishama son of Ammihud;

content_old: 19 and his host､even they who are numbered of them,—forty thousand､ and five hundred.

content_old: 31 All they who are numbered to the camp of Dan, a hundred and fifty-seven thousand､ and six hundred in the hindmost rank shall they set forward､ by their standards.

content_old: 32 These are they who were numbered of the sons of Israel､ by their ancestral houses,—all they who were numbered of the camps､ by their hosts were six hundred and three thousand､ and five hundred､ and fifty.

content: 33 But the Levites were not numbered in the midst of the sons of Israel,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 33 But the Levites were not numbered in the midst of the sons of Israel,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 1 Now these were the pedigrees of Aaron､ and Moses,—in the day when Yahweh spake with Moses､ in Mount Sinai.
content_old: 1 Now these were the pedigrees of Aaron､ and Moses,—in the day when Yahweh spake with Moses､ in Mount Sinai.

content: 2 And these are the names of the sons of Aaron—the firstborn Nadab,—and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.
content_old: 2 And these are the names of the sons of Aaron—the firstborn Nadab,—and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.

content: 3 These are the names of the sons of Aaron, the priests that were anointed,—who were installed to minister as priests.
content_old: 3 These are the names of the sons of Aaron, the priests that were anointed,—who were installed to minister as priests.

content: 4 But Nadab and Abihu died before Yahweh､ when they brought near strange fire before Yahweh､ in the desert of Sinai, and sons had they none,—so then Eleazar and Ithamar ministered as priests, in the presence of Aaron their father.
content_old: 4 But Nadab and Abihu died before Yahweh､ when they brought near strange fire before Yahweh､ in the desert of Sinai, and sons had they none,—so then Eleazar and Ithamar ministered as priests, in the presence of Aaron their father.

content: 5 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses, saying—
content_old: 5 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses, saying—

content: 6 Bring near the tribe of Levi, and thou shalt cause it to stand before Aaron the priest,—so shall they wait upon him;
content_old: 6 Bring near the tribe of Levi, and thou shalt cause it to stand before Aaron the priest,—so shall they wait upon him;

content: 7 so shall they keep his charge､ and the charge of all the assembly, before the tent of meeting,—to do the laborious work of the habitation;
content_old: 7 so shall they keep his charge､ and the charge of all the assembly, before the tent of meeting,—to do the laborious work of the habitation;

content: 8 so shall they have charge of all the furniture of the tent of meeting, even the charge of the sons of Israel,—to do the laborious work of the habitation.
content_old: 8 so shall they have charge of all the furniture of the tent of meeting, even the charge of the sons of Israel,—to do the laborious work of the habitation.

content: 9 Thus shalt thou give the Levites unto Aaron､ and unto his sons,—given､ given they are unto him, from among the sons of Israel;
content_old: 9 Thus shalt thou give the Levites unto Aaron､ and unto his sons,—given､ given they are unto him, from among the sons of Israel;

content: 10 but unto Aaron､ and unto his sons shalt thou give oversight, so shall they keep charge of their priesthood,—and the stranger who cometh near shall be put to death.
content_old: 10 but unto Aaron､ and unto his sons shalt thou give oversight, so shall they keep charge of their priesthood,—and the stranger who cometh near shall be put to death.

content: 11 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses､ saying—
content_old: 11 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses､ saying—

content: 12 I therefore､ lo! I have taken the Levites out of the midst of the sons of Israel, instead of every firstborn that a mother beareth､ from among the sons of Israel,—so shall the Levites be mine;
content_old: 12 I therefore､ lo! I have taken the Levites out of the midst of the sons of Israel, instead of every firstborn that a mother beareth､ from among the sons of Israel,—so shall the Levites be mine;

content: 13 for mine is every firstborn, in the day when I smote every firstborn in the land of Egypt I hallowed unto myself､ every firstborn in Israel, both of man and of beast,—mine did they become､ and belong unto me､ Yahweh.
content_old: 13 for mine is every firstborn, in the day when I smote every firstborn in the land of Egypt I hallowed unto myself､ every firstborn in Israel, both of man and of beast,—mine did they become､ and belong unto me､ Yahweh.

content: 14 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses, in the desert of Sinai､ saying:—
content_old: 14 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses, in the desert of Sinai､ saying:—

content: 15 Number thou the sons of Levi､ by their ancestral houses, by their families,—every male､ from one month old and upwards shalt thou number them.
content_old: 15 Number thou the sons of Levi､ by their ancestral houses, by their families,—every male､ from one month old and upwards shalt thou number them.

content: 16 So then Moses numbered them､ according to the bidding of Yahweh,—as he was commanded.
content_old: 16 So then Moses numbered them､ according to the bidding of Yahweh,—as he was commanded.

content: 17 And these were the sons of Levi､ by their names,—Gershon, and Kohath､ and Merari.
content_old: 17 And these were the sons of Levi､ by their names,—Gershon, and Kohath､ and Merari.

content: 18 And these the names of the sons of Gershon､ by their families,—Libni､ and Shimei.
content_old: 18 And these the names of the sons of Gershon､ by their families,—Libni､ and Shimei.

content: 19 And the sons of Kohath､ by their families Amram､ and Izhar, Hebron､ and Uzziel.
content_old: 19 And the sons of Kohath､ by their families Amram､ and Izhar, Hebron､ and Uzziel.

content: 20 And the sons of Merari､ by their families Mahli and Mushi. These are they—the families of the Levites､ by their ancestral houses.
content_old: 20 And the sons of Merari､ by their families Mahli and Mushi. These are they—the families of the Levites､ by their ancestral houses.

content: 21 To Gershon belonged the family of the Libnites, and the family of the Shimeites,—these are they—the families of the Gershonites.
content_old: 21 To Gershon belonged the family of the Libnites, and the family of the Shimeites,—these are they—the families of the Gershonites.

content: 22 They who were numbered of them､ in the counting of every male, from one month old､ and upwards,—they who were numbered of them were seven thousand､ and five hundred.
content_old: 22 They who were numbered of them､ in the counting of every male, from one month old､ and upwards,—they who were numbered of them were seven thousand､ and five hundred.

content: 23 The families of the Gershonites to the rear of the habitation were to encamp､ westward.
content_old: 23 The families of the Gershonites to the rear of the habitation were to encamp､ westward.

content: 24 And the prince of the ancestral house of the Gershonites was Eliasaph､ son of Lâêl.
content_old: 24 And the prince of the ancestral house of the Gershonites was Eliasaph､ son of Lâêl.

content: 25 And the charge of the sons of Gershon was over the tent of meeting, the habitation, and the tent,—the covering thereof, and the screen for the entrance of the tent of meeting;
content_old: 25 And the charge of the sons of Gershon was over the tent of meeting, the habitation, and the tent,—the covering thereof, and the screen for the entrance of the tent of meeting;

content: 26 and the hangings of the court, and the screen for the entrance of the court which was near the habitation､ and near the altar, round about,—and the cords thereof, as to all the laborious work thereof.
content_old: 26 and the hangings of the court, and the screen for the entrance of the court which was near the habitation､ and near the altar, round about,—and the cords thereof, as to all the laborious work thereof.

content: 27 And to Kohath belonged the family of the Amramites､ and the family of the Izharites, and the family of the Hebronites, and the family of the Uzzielites,—these are they—the families of the Kohathites.
content_old: 27 And to Kohath belonged the family of the Amramites､ and the family of the Izharites, and the family of the Hebronites, and the family of the Uzzielites,—these are they—the families of the Kohathites.

content: 28 In the counting of every male, from one month old and upwards there were eight thousand､ and six hundred, to keep the charge of the sanctuary.
content_old: 28 In the counting of every male, from one month old and upwards there were eight thousand､ and six hundred, to keep the charge of the sanctuary.

content: 29 The families of the sons of Kohath were to encamp,—on the side of the habitation､ southward.
content_old: 29 The families of the sons of Kohath were to encamp,—on the side of the habitation､ southward.

content: 30 And the prince of the ancestral house of the families of the Kohathites was Elizaphan､ son of Uzziel.
content_old: 30 And the prince of the ancestral house of the families of the Kohathites was Elizaphan､ son of Uzziel.

content: 31 And their charge was—the ark､ and the table､ and the lampstand and the altars, and the utensils of the sanctuary wherewith they were to minister,—and the screen, as to all the laborious work thereof.
content_old: 31 And their charge was—the ark､ and the table､ and the lampstand and the altars, and the utensils of the sanctuary wherewith they were to minister,—and the screen, as to all the laborious work thereof.

content: 32 And the prince of the princes of the Levites was Eleazar､ son of Aaron the priest,—to have the oversight of them that were to keep the charge of the sanctuary.
content_old: 32 And the prince of the princes of the Levites was Eleazar､ son of Aaron the priest,—to have the oversight of them that were to keep the charge of the sanctuary.

content: 33 To Merari belonged the family of the Mahlites, and the family of the Mushites,—these are they—the families of Merari.
content_old: 33 To Merari belonged the family of the Mahlites, and the family of the Mushites,—these are they—the families of Merari.

content: 34 And they who were numbered of them､ in the counting of every male, from one month old and upwards were six thousand､ and two hundred.
content_old: 34 And they who were numbered of them､ in the counting of every male, from one month old and upwards were six thousand､ and two hundred.

content: 35 And the prince of the ancestral house of the families of Merari was Zuriel､ son of Abihail,—on the side of the habitation were they to encamp northward.
content_old: 35 And the prince of the ancestral house of the families of Merari was Zuriel､ son of Abihail,—on the side of the habitation were they to encamp northward.

content: 36 And the oversight of the charge of the sons of Merari was—the boards of the habitation, and the bars thereof､ and the pillars thereof and the sockets thereof,—and all the furniture thereof, as to all the laborious work thereof;
content_old: 36 And the oversight of the charge of the sons of Merari was—the boards of the habitation, and the bars thereof､ and the pillars thereof and the sockets thereof,—and all the furniture thereof, as to all the laborious work thereof;

content: 37 also the pillars of the court round about､ and their sockets,—and their pins､ and their cords.
content_old: 37 also the pillars of the court round about､ and their sockets,—and their pins､ and their cords.

content: 38 But they who were to encamp before the habitation､ eastwards､ before the tent of meeting､ towards sun-rise were Moses and Aaron and his sons､ to keep the charge of the sanctuary, as the charge of the sons of Israel､ and the stranger that came near was to be put to death.
content_old: 38 But they who were to encamp before the habitation､ eastwards､ before the tent of meeting､ towards sun-rise were Moses and Aaron and his sons､ to keep the charge of the sanctuary, as the charge of the sons of Israel､ and the stranger that came near was to be put to death.

content: 39 All they who were numbered of the Levites､ whom Moses and Aaron numbered at the bidding of Yahweh､ by their families,—every male､ from one month old and upwards were two-and-twenty thousand.
content_old: 39 All they who were numbered of the Levites､ whom Moses and Aaron numbered at the bidding of Yahweh､ by their families,—every male､ from one month old and upwards were two-and-twenty thousand.

content: 40 And Yahweh said unto Moses: Number thou every firstborn male belonging to the sons of Israel, from one month old and upwards,—and reckon up the number of their names;
content_old: 40 And Yahweh said unto Moses: Number thou every firstborn male belonging to the sons of Israel, from one month old and upwards,—and reckon up the number of their names;

content: 41 then shalt thou take the Levites for me､ me Yahweh, instead of every firstborn among the sons of Israel,—also the cattle of the Levites, instead of every firstling among the cattle of the sons of Israel.
content_old: 41 then shalt thou take the Levites for me､ me Yahweh, instead of every firstborn among the sons of Israel,—also the cattle of the Levites, instead of every firstling among the cattle of the sons of Israel.

content: 42 So then Moses numbered, as Yahweh commanded him,—every firstborn among the sons of Israel.
content_old: 42 So then Moses numbered, as Yahweh commanded him,—every firstborn among the sons of Israel.

content: 43 And it was so—that all the firstborn of the males､ in the counting of names from one month old and upwards､ of such as were numbered of them,—were two-and-twenty thousand, two hundred and seventy-three.
content_old: 43 And it was so—that all the firstborn of the males､ in the counting of names from one month old and upwards､ of such as were numbered of them,—were two-and-twenty thousand, two hundred and seventy-three.

content: 44 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses, saying:—
content_old: 44 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses, saying:—

content: 45 Take the Levites, instead of all the firstborn among the sons of Israel, and the cattle of the Levites､ instead of their cattle,—so shall the Levites belong unto me､me Yahweh;
content_old: 45 Take the Levites, instead of all the firstborn among the sons of Israel, and the cattle of the Levites､ instead of their cattle,—so shall the Levites belong unto me､me Yahweh;

content: 46 and as the ransom of the two hundred and seventy-three,—who are more than the Levites､ of the firstborn of the sons of Israel
content_old: 46 and as the ransom of the two hundred and seventy-three,—who are more than the Levites､ of the firstborn of the sons of Israel

content: 47 thou shalt take five shekels apiece､ by the poll,—by the shekel of the sanctuary shalt thou take it, twenty gerahs to the shekel;
content_old: 47 thou shalt take five shekels apiece､ by the poll,—by the shekel of the sanctuary shalt thou take it, twenty gerahs to the shekel;

content: 48 and shalt give the silver to Aaron､ and to his sons,—as the ransom of them that are in excess over them.
content_old: 48 and shalt give the silver to Aaron､ and to his sons,—as the ransom of them that are in excess over them.

content: 49 So Moses took the redemption silver from them who were in excess over them who were redeemed by the Levites:
content_old: 49 So Moses took the redemption silver from them who were in excess over them who were redeemed by the Levites:

content: 50 from the firstborn of the sons of Israel took he the silver,—a thousand､ three hundred､ and sixty-five shekels, by the shekel of the sanctuary.
content_old: 50 from the firstborn of the sons of Israel took he the silver,—a thousand､ three hundred､ and sixty-five shekels, by the shekel of the sanctuary.

content: 1 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses and unto Aaron､ saying:
content_old: 1 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses and unto Aaron､ saying:

content: 2 Reckon up the sum of the sons of Kohath, out of the midst of the sons of Levi,—by their families､ by their ancestral house:
content_old: 2 Reckon up the sum of the sons of Kohath, out of the midst of the sons of Levi,—by their families､ by their ancestral house:

content: 3 from thirty years old､ and upwards, even unto fifty years,—every one that can enter into the host, to do service in the tent of meeting.
content_old: 3 from thirty years old､ and upwards, even unto fifty years,—every one that can enter into the host, to do service in the tent of meeting.

content: 4 This shall be the labour of the sons of Kohath､ in the tent of meeting,—the most holy things.
content_old: 4 This shall be the labour of the sons of Kohath､ in the tent of meeting,—the most holy things.

content: 5 So then Aaron and his sons shall enter､ when the camp is to set forward, and take down the screening veil,—and enwrap therein the ark of the testimony;
content_old: 5 So then Aaron and his sons shall enter､ when the camp is to set forward, and take down the screening veil,—and enwrap therein the ark of the testimony;

content: 6 and put thereon a covering of badgers’ skin, and spread a complete wrapper of blue､ over above,—and put in the staves thereof.
content_old: 6 and put thereon a covering of badgers’ skin, and spread a complete wrapper of blue､ over above,—and put in the staves thereof.

content: 7 And over the Presence-table shall they spread a wrapper of blue､ and put thereon the dishes and the pans and the bowls and the libation cups, the perpetual bread also thereupon shall remain;
content_old: 7 And over the Presence-table shall they spread a wrapper of blue､ and put thereon the dishes and the pans and the bowls and the libation cups, the perpetual bread also thereupon shall remain;

content: 8 and they shall spread over them a wrapper of crimson, and cover the same with a covering of badgers’ skin,—and shall put in the staves thereof.
content_old: 8 and they shall spread over them a wrapper of crimson, and cover the same with a covering of badgers’ skin,—and shall put in the staves thereof.

content: 9 Then shall they take a wrapper of blue, and cover the light-giving lampstand and the lamps thereof､ and the snuffers thereof､ and the snuff-trays thereof,—and all the oil-vessels-thereof, wherewith they minister thereunto;
content_old: 9 Then shall they take a wrapper of blue, and cover the light-giving lampstand and the lamps thereof､ and the snuffers thereof､ and the snuff-trays thereof,—and all the oil-vessels-thereof, wherewith they minister thereunto;

content: 10 and shall put the same､ and all the vessels thereof, within a covering of badgers’ skin,—and shall put it upon a frame.
content_old: 10 and shall put the same､ and all the vessels thereof, within a covering of badgers’ skin,—and shall put it upon a frame.

content: 11 And upon the altar of gold shall they spread a wrapper of blue, and shall cover the same in a covering of badgers’ skin,—and shall put in the staves thereof.
content_old: 11 And upon the altar of gold shall they spread a wrapper of blue, and shall cover the same in a covering of badgers’ skin,—and shall put in the staves thereof.

content: 12 And they shall take all the utensils of attendance wherewith they attend in the sanctuary､ and put them within a wrapper of blue, and cover the same in a covering of badgers’ skin,—and put them on a frame.
content_old: 12 And they shall take all the utensils of attendance wherewith they attend in the sanctuary､ and put them within a wrapper of blue, and cover the same in a covering of badgers’ skin,—and put them on a frame.

content: 13 Then shall they remove the fat-ashes from the altar,—and spread over it a wrapper of purple;
content_old: 13 Then shall they remove the fat-ashes from the altar,—and spread over it a wrapper of purple;

content: 14 and put thereupon all the utensils thereof､ wherewith they minister thereupon—the fire-pans､ the flesh-hooks-and the shovels and the tossing-bowls, all the utensils of the altar,—and shall spread over it a covering of badgers’ skin､ and put in the staves thereof.
content_old: 14 and put thereupon all the utensils thereof､ wherewith they minister thereupon—the fire-pans､ the flesh-hooks-and the shovels and the tossing-bowls, all the utensils of the altar,—and shall spread over it a covering of badgers’ skin､ and put in the staves thereof.

content: 15 So shall Aaron and his sons make an end of covering the sanctuary､ and all the utensils of the sanctuary､ when the camp is to set forward, then after that shall the sons of Kohath enter to bear it, but they must not put forth a touch unto that which is holy､ else should they die,—these shall be the burden of the sons of Kohath､ in the tent of meeting.
content_old: 15 So shall Aaron and his sons make an end of covering the sanctuary､ and all the utensils of the sanctuary､ when the camp is to set forward, then after that shall the sons of Kohath enter to bear it, but they must not put forth a touch unto that which is holy､ else should they die,—these shall be the burden of the sons of Kohath､ in the tent of meeting.

content: 16 But the care of Eleazar son of Aaron the priest shall be—the light-giving oil､ and the fragrant incense, and the perpetual meal-offering､ and the anointing oil､ the care of all the habitation､ and all that is therein, both as to the sanctuary､ and as to the furniture thereof.
content_old: 16 But the care of Eleazar son of Aaron the priest shall be—the light-giving oil､ and the fragrant incense, and the perpetual meal-offering､ and the anointing oil､ the care of all the habitation､ and all that is therein, both as to the sanctuary､ and as to the furniture thereof.

content: 17 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses and unto Aaron､ saying:
content_old: 17 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses and unto Aaron､ saying:

content: 18 Do not let the tribe of the families of the Kohathites be cut off out of the midst of the Levites.
content_old: 18 Do not let the tribe of the families of the Kohathites be cut off out of the midst of the Levites.

content: 19 This､ therefore､ do ye for them, so shall they live､ and not die､ when they approach the most holy place,—Aaron and his sons shall enter and set them､ man by man､ over his labour､ and unto his burden;
content_old: 19 This､ therefore､ do ye for them, so shall they live､ and not die､ when they approach the most holy place,—Aaron and his sons shall enter and set them､ man by man､ over his labour､ and unto his burden;

content: 20 but they shall not enter to see､ for a moment､ that which is holy､ else should they die.
content_old: 20 but they shall not enter to see､ for a moment､ that which is holy､ else should they die.

content: 21 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 21 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses､ saying:

content: 22 Reckon up the sum of the sons of Gershon even of them also,—by their ancestral house､ by their families;
content_old: 22 Reckon up the sum of the sons of Gershon even of them also,—by their ancestral house､ by their families;

content: 23 from thirty years old and upwards､ even to fifty years shalt thou number them,—all that may enter to take rank in the host, to do laborious work in the tent of meeting.
content_old: 23 from thirty years old and upwards､ even to fifty years shalt thou number them,—all that may enter to take rank in the host, to do laborious work in the tent of meeting.

content: 24 This shall be the labour of the families of the Gershonites,—in labouring and in bearing:—
content_old: 24 This shall be the labour of the families of the Gershonites,—in labouring and in bearing:—

content: 25 they shall bear the curtains of the habitation､ and the tent of meeting, the covering thereof､ and the covering of badgers’ skin which is over above it,—and the screen, at the entrance of the tent of meeting;
content_old: 25 they shall bear the curtains of the habitation､ and the tent of meeting, the covering thereof､ and the covering of badgers’ skin which is over above it,—and the screen, at the entrance of the tent of meeting;

content: 26 and the hangings of the court､ and the screen for the entrance of the gate of the court which is near the habitation､ and near the altar､ round about, and their cords､ and all their articles of service, and all that is to be done to them､ when they shall do their labour.
content_old: 26 and the hangings of the court､ and the screen for the entrance of the gate of the court which is near the habitation､ and near the altar､ round about, and their cords､ and all their articles of service, and all that is to be done to them､ when they shall do their labour.

content: 27 At the bidding of Aaron and his sons shall be all the labour of the sons of the Gershonites, to the extent of their every burden, and to the extent of all their labour,—so shall ye appoint unto them in charge their every burden.
content_old: 27 At the bidding of Aaron and his sons shall be all the labour of the sons of the Gershonites, to the extent of their every burden, and to the extent of all their labour,—so shall ye appoint unto them in charge their every burden.

content: 28 This shall be the labour of the families of the sons of the Gershonites､ in the tent of meeting,—and the charge of them shall be in the hand of Ithamar, son of Aaron､ the priest.
content_old: 28 This shall be the labour of the families of the sons of the Gershonites､ in the tent of meeting,—and the charge of them shall be in the hand of Ithamar, son of Aaron､ the priest.

content: 29 As for the sons of Merari,—by their families､ by their ancestral house shall ye number them;
content_old: 29 As for the sons of Merari,—by their families､ by their ancestral house shall ye number them;

content: 30 from thirty years old and upwards､ even to fifty years shall ye number them,—all that enter into the host, to do laborious work in the tent of meeting.
content_old: 30 from thirty years old and upwards､ even to fifty years shall ye number them,—all that enter into the host, to do laborious work in the tent of meeting.

content: 31 And this shall be their charge of the burdens, to the extent of all their labour in the tent of meeting,—the boards of the habitation, and the bars thereof､ and the pillars thereof and the sockets thereof;
content_old: 31 And this shall be their charge of the burdens, to the extent of all their labour in the tent of meeting,—the boards of the habitation, and the bars thereof､ and the pillars thereof and the sockets thereof;

content: 32 and the pillars of the court round about､ and their sockets and their pins and their cords, to the extent of all their articles, to the extent of all their labour,—and by names shall ye put under their care the articles of their charge of burdens.
content_old: 32 and the pillars of the court round about､ and their sockets and their pins and their cords, to the extent of all their articles, to the extent of all their labour,—and by names shall ye put under their care the articles of their charge of burdens.

content: 33 This shall be the labour of the families of the sons of Merari, to the extent of all their labour in the tent of meeting,—in the hand of Ithamar, son of Aaron､ the priest.
content_old: 33 This shall be the labour of the families of the sons of Merari, to the extent of all their labour in the tent of meeting,—in the hand of Ithamar, son of Aaron､ the priest.

content: 34 Then did Moses and Aaron､ and the princes of the assembly､ number the sons of the Kohathites,—by their families､ and by their ancestral house;
content_old: 34 Then did Moses and Aaron､ and the princes of the assembly､ number the sons of the Kohathites,—by their families､ and by their ancestral house;

content: 35 from thirty years old and upwards, even unto fifty years old, all that might enter the host, to labour in the tent of meeting;
content_old: 35 from thirty years old and upwards, even unto fifty years old, all that might enter the host, to labour in the tent of meeting;

content: 36 and they who were numbered of them､ by their families, were found to be—two thousand､ seven hundred､ and fifty.
content_old: 36 and they who were numbered of them､ by their families, were found to be—two thousand､ seven hundred､ and fifty.

content: 37 These were they who were numbered､ of the families of the Kohathites, all that might labour in the tent of meeting,—whom Moses and Aaron did number, at the bidding of Yahweh by the mediation of Moses.
content_old: 37 These were they who were numbered､ of the families of the Kohathites, all that might labour in the tent of meeting,—whom Moses and Aaron did number, at the bidding of Yahweh by the mediation of Moses.

content: 38 And they who were numbered of the sons of Gershon,—by their families､ and by their ancestral house;
content_old: 38 And they who were numbered of the sons of Gershon,—by their families､ and by their ancestral house;

content: 39 from thirty years old and upwards, even to fifty years old,—all that might enter the host, to labour in the tent of meeting:
content_old: 39 from thirty years old and upwards, even to fifty years old,—all that might enter the host, to labour in the tent of meeting:

content: 40 yea they who were numbered of them, by their families､ by their ancestral house,—were found to be—two thousand, and six hundred､ and thirty.
content_old: 40 yea they who were numbered of them, by their families､ by their ancestral house,—were found to be—two thousand, and six hundred､ and thirty.

content: 41 These are they who were numbered of the families of the sons of Gershon, all who might labour in the tent of meeting,—whom Moses and Aaron did number､ at the bidding of Yahweh.
content_old: 41 These are they who were numbered of the families of the sons of Gershon, all who might labour in the tent of meeting,—whom Moses and Aaron did number､ at the bidding of Yahweh.

content: 42 And they who were numbered of the families of the sons of Merari,—by their families､ by their ancestral house;
content_old: 42 And they who were numbered of the families of the sons of Merari,—by their families､ by their ancestral house;

content: 43 from thirty years old and upwards, even unto fifty years old,—all that might enter the host to labour in the tent of meeting;
content_old: 43 from thirty years old and upwards, even unto fifty years old,—all that might enter the host to labour in the tent of meeting;

content: 44 yea they who were numbered of them, by their families,—were found to be—three thousand and two hundred.
content_old: 44 yea they who were numbered of them, by their families,—were found to be—three thousand and two hundred.

content: 45 These are they who were numbered of the families of the sons of Merari,—whom Moses and Aaron did number, at the bidding of Yahweh､ by the mediation of Moses.
content_old: 45 These are they who were numbered of the families of the sons of Merari,—whom Moses and Aaron did number, at the bidding of Yahweh､ by the mediation of Moses.

content: 46 All they who were numbered､ whom Moses and Aaron and the princes of Israel did number､ even the Levites,—by their families､ and by their ancestral house;
content_old: 46 All they who were numbered､ whom Moses and Aaron and the princes of Israel did number､ even the Levites,—by their families､ and by their ancestral house;

content: 47 from thirty years old and upwards, even unto fifty years old,—all that might enter､ to toil in the work of labouring and in the work of bearing burdens､ in the tent of meeting
content_old: 47 from thirty years old and upwards, even unto fifty years old,—all that might enter､ to toil in the work of labouring and in the work of bearing burdens､ in the tent of meeting

content: 48 yea, they who were numbered of them were found to be—eight thousand, and five hundred､ and eighty.
content_old: 48 yea, they who were numbered of them were found to be—eight thousand, and five hundred､ and eighty.

content: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:—
content_old: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:—

content: 2 Command the sons of Israel, that they send forth out of the camp, every leper､ and every one that hath a flux,—and every one that is unclean by the dead:
content_old: 2 Command the sons of Israel, that they send forth out of the camp, every leper､ and every one that hath a flux,—and every one that is unclean by the dead:

content: 3 whether male or female ye shall send them forth, unto the outside of the camp shall ye send them,—that they make not their camps unclean, in the midst whereof I have my habitation.
content_old: 3 whether male or female ye shall send them forth, unto the outside of the camp shall ye send them,—that they make not their camps unclean, in the midst whereof I have my habitation.

content: 4 And the sons of Israel did so, and sent them forth unto the outside of the camp,—as Yahweh spake unto Moses so did the sons of Israel.
content_old: 4 And the sons of Israel did so, and sent them forth unto the outside of the camp,—as Yahweh spake unto Moses so did the sons of Israel.

content: 5 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 5 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:

content: 6 Speak unto the sons of Israel: When any man or woman shall do aught of any human sin, in acting unfaithfully against Yahweh,—and that person shall become aware of his guilt
content_old: 6 Speak unto the sons of Israel: When any man or woman shall do aught of any human sin, in acting unfaithfully against Yahweh,—and that person shall become aware of his guilt

content: 7 then shall they confess their sin which they have done, and he shall make good that wherein he is guilty､ in the principal thereof, and the fifth part thereof shall he add thereunto,—and give to him against whom he is guilty.
content_old: 7 then shall they confess their sin which they have done, and he shall make good that wherein he is guilty､ in the principal thereof, and the fifth part thereof shall he add thereunto,—and give to him against whom he is guilty.

content: 8 But if one have no kinsman unto whom he may make good that wherein he is guilty then that wherein he is guilty､ which is to be restored to Yahweh shall be the priest’s,—besides the ram of propitiation, wherewith a propitiatory-covering is to be put over him.
content_old: 8 But if one have no kinsman unto whom he may make good that wherein he is guilty then that wherein he is guilty､ which is to be restored to Yahweh shall be the priest’s,—besides the ram of propitiation, wherewith a propitiatory-covering is to be put over him.

content: 9 And every heave-offering, of all the hallowed things of the sons of Israel､ which they bring near to the priest unto him shall it belong.
content_old: 9 And every heave-offering, of all the hallowed things of the sons of Israel､ which they bring near to the priest unto him shall it belong.

content: 10 And every man’s hallowed things shall be his own,—what any man giveth to the priest shall be his.
content_old: 10 And every man’s hallowed things shall be his own,—what any man giveth to the priest shall be his.

content: 11 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 11 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:

content: 12 Speak unto the sons of Israel, and thou shalt say unto them,— When any man’s wife shall turn aside, and commit against him an act of unfaithfulness;
content_old: 12 Speak unto the sons of Israel, and thou shalt say unto them,— When any man’s wife shall turn aside, and commit against him an act of unfaithfulness;

content: 13 and a man shall lie with her carnally, and it shall be concealed from the eyes of her husband､ and be kept close､ but she hath committed uncleanness,—though witness there is none against her, and she hath not been caught;
content_old: 13 and a man shall lie with her carnally, and it shall be concealed from the eyes of her husband､ and be kept close､ but she hath committed uncleanness,—though witness there is none against her, and she hath not been caught;

content: 14 but there shall pass over him a spirit of jealousy､ and he shall become jealous of his wife､she having committed uncleanness,—or there shall pass over him a spirit of jealousy､ and he shall become jealous of his wife, she not having committed uncleanness
content_old: 14 but there shall pass over him a spirit of jealousy､ and he shall become jealous of his wife､she having committed uncleanness,—or there shall pass over him a spirit of jealousy､ and he shall become jealous of his wife, she not having committed uncleanness

content: 15 then shall the man bring in his wife unto the priest, and shall bring in her offering for her, the tenth of an ephah of the meal of barley,—he shall not pour thereon oil, nor put thereon frankincense, for a jealousy gift it is, a reminding gift､ bringing to mind iniquity.
content_old: 15 then shall the man bring in his wife unto the priest, and shall bring in her offering for her, the tenth of an ephah of the meal of barley,—he shall not pour thereon oil, nor put thereon frankincense, for a jealousy gift it is, a reminding gift､ bringing to mind iniquity.

content: 16 Then shall the priest bring her near,—and cause her to stand before Yahweh;
content_old: 16 Then shall the priest bring her near,—and cause her to stand before Yahweh;

content: 17 and the priest shall take hallowed water in an earthen vessel,—and of the dust which shall be upon the floor of the habitation shall the priest take､ and put into the water;
content_old: 17 and the priest shall take hallowed water in an earthen vessel,—and of the dust which shall be upon the floor of the habitation shall the priest take､ and put into the water;

content: 18 and the priest shall cause the woman to stand before Yahweh, and shall bare the head of the woman, and shall place upon her hands the reminding gift､ it being a jealousy gift,—and in the hand of the priest shall be the deadly water､ that bringeth a curse;
content_old: 18 and the priest shall cause the woman to stand before Yahweh, and shall bare the head of the woman, and shall place upon her hands the reminding gift､ it being a jealousy gift,—and in the hand of the priest shall be the deadly water､ that bringeth a curse;

content: 19 and the priest shall put her on oath､ and shall say unto the woman:— If no man hath lain with thee､ and if thou hast not turned aside､ in uncleanness､ unto another instead of thy husband be thou clear from this deadly water that causeth a curse.
content_old: 19 and the priest shall put her on oath､ and shall say unto the woman:— If no man hath lain with thee､ and if thou hast not turned aside､ in uncleanness､ unto another instead of thy husband be thou clear from this deadly water that causeth a curse.

content: 20 But if thou hast turned aside to another instead of thy husband､ and if thou hast made thyself unclean,—in that a man hath known thee carnally, other than thy husband
content_old: 20 But if thou hast turned aside to another instead of thy husband､ and if thou hast made thyself unclean,—in that a man hath known thee carnally, other than thy husband

content: 21 then shall the priest put the woman on oath､ with an oath of cursing, and the priest shall say unto the woman, Yahweh give thee up for a curse and for an oath､ in the midst of thy people,—in that Yahweh shall give up thy thigh to fall away, and thy womb to swell:
content_old: 21 then shall the priest put the woman on oath､ with an oath of cursing, and the priest shall say unto the woman, Yahweh give thee up for a curse and for an oath､ in the midst of thy people,—in that Yahweh shall give up thy thigh to fall away, and thy womb to swell:

content: 22 so shall this water that causeth a curse､ enter into thy body, causing womb to swell and thigh to fall away. And the woman shall say､ Amen, Amen.
content_old: 22 so shall this water that causeth a curse､ enter into thy body, causing womb to swell and thigh to fall away. And the woman shall say､ Amen, Amen.

content: 23 Then shall the priest write these curses in a scroll,—and wipe them out into the deadly water;
content_old: 23 Then shall the priest write these curses in a scroll,—and wipe them out into the deadly water;

content: 24 and shall cause the woman to drink the deadly water that causeth a curse,—and the deadly water that causeth a curse shall enter into her.
content_old: 24 and shall cause the woman to drink the deadly water that causeth a curse,—and the deadly water that causeth a curse shall enter into her.

content: 25 Then shall the priest take from the hand of the woman the jealousy meal-offering,—and shall wave the meal-offering before Yahweh, and bring it near unto the altar;
content_old: 25 Then shall the priest take from the hand of the woman the jealousy meal-offering,—and shall wave the meal-offering before Yahweh, and bring it near unto the altar;

content: 26 and the priest shall take a handful from the meal-offering, a remembrancer thereof, and make a perfume at the altar,—and afterwards shall cause the woman to drink the water.
content_old: 26 and the priest shall take a handful from the meal-offering, a remembrancer thereof, and make a perfume at the altar,—and afterwards shall cause the woman to drink the water.

content: 27 And as soon as he causeth her to drink the water then shall it be, that, if she have fallen into uncleanness､ and committed unfaithfulness against her husband as soon as the deadly water that causeth a curse hath entered into her so soon shall her womb swell and her thigh fall away,—thus shall the woman become a curse､ in the midst of her people.
content_old: 27 And as soon as he causeth her to drink the water then shall it be, that, if she have fallen into uncleanness､ and committed unfaithfulness against her husband as soon as the deadly water that causeth a curse hath entered into her so soon shall her womb swell and her thigh fall away,—thus shall the woman become a curse､ in the midst of her people.

content: 28 But if the woman have not fallen into uncleanness, but is pure then shall she be clear､ and shall bear seed.
content_old: 28 But if the woman have not fallen into uncleanness, but is pure then shall she be clear､ and shall bear seed.

content: 29 This is the law of jealousies,—when a wife shall turn aside to another instead of her husband､ and fall into uncleanness;
content_old: 29 This is the law of jealousies,—when a wife shall turn aside to another instead of her husband､ and fall into uncleanness;

content: 30 or when there passeth over a husband a spirit of jealousy, and he becometh jealous of his wife then shall he cause the woman to stand before Yahweh, and the priest shall execute upon her all this law:
content_old: 30 or when there passeth over a husband a spirit of jealousy, and he becometh jealous of his wife then shall he cause the woman to stand before Yahweh, and the priest shall execute upon her all this law:

content: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:

content: 2 Speak unto the sons of Israel, and thou shalt say unto them,— When any man or woman would make the special vow of One Separate, by separating himself unto Yahweh
content_old: 2 Speak unto the sons of Israel, and thou shalt say unto them,— When any man or woman would make the special vow of One Separate, by separating himself unto Yahweh

content: 3 from wine and strong drink shall he separate himself, neither vinegar of wine､ nor vinegar of strong drink shall he drink,—and no liquor of grapes shall he drink, no grapes fresh or dried shall he eat.
content_old: 3 from wine and strong drink shall he separate himself, neither vinegar of wine､ nor vinegar of strong drink shall he drink,—and no liquor of grapes shall he drink, no grapes fresh or dried shall he eat.

content: 4 All the days of his separation of nothing that is made from the grapevine､ from the seeds even to the skin shall he eat.
content_old: 4 All the days of his separation of nothing that is made from the grapevine､ from the seeds even to the skin shall he eat.

content: 5 All the days of his vow of separation no razor shall pass over his head,—until the days are fulfilled for which he shall separate himself to Yahweh hallowed shall he be, letting the locks of the hair of his head grow long.
content_old: 5 All the days of his vow of separation no razor shall pass over his head,—until the days are fulfilled for which he shall separate himself to Yahweh hallowed shall he be, letting the locks of the hair of his head grow long.

content: 6 All the days for which he hath separated himself unto Yahweh to no dead person shall he go in.
content_old: 6 All the days for which he hath separated himself unto Yahweh to no dead person shall he go in.

content: 7 Neither for his father nor for his mother､ nor for his brother､ nor for his sister shall he make himself unclean—not even for them､ should they die,—because his separation unto God is upon his head.
content_old: 7 Neither for his father nor for his mother､ nor for his brother､ nor for his sister shall he make himself unclean—not even for them､ should they die,—because his separation unto God is upon his head.

content: 8 All his days of separation hallowed is he unto Yahweh.
content_old: 8 All his days of separation hallowed is he unto Yahweh.

content: 9 But if one that is dying should die by him in a moment､ suddenly then shall he count unclean his head of separation,—and shall shave his head､ on the day he cleanseth himself, on the seventh day shall he shave it.
content_old: 9 But if one that is dying should die by him in a moment､ suddenly then shall he count unclean his head of separation,—and shall shave his head､ on the day he cleanseth himself, on the seventh day shall he shave it.

content: 10 And on the eighth day shall he bring in､ two turtle-doves, or two young pigeons,—unto the priest, unto the entrance of the tent of meeting;
content_old: 10 And on the eighth day shall he bring in､ two turtle-doves, or two young pigeons,—unto the priest, unto the entrance of the tent of meeting;

content: 11 and the priest shall make, of one a sinbearer､ and of one an ascending-sacrifice, and so put a propitiatory-covering over him, for that he sinned in respect of the dead person,—thus shall he hallow his head､ on that day.
content_old: 11 and the priest shall make, of one a sinbearer､ and of one an ascending-sacrifice, and so put a propitiatory-covering over him, for that he sinned in respect of the dead person,—thus shall he hallow his head､ on that day.

content: 12 Then shall he separate unto Yahweh his days of separation, and shall bring in a he-lamb a year old､ as a guilt-bearer,—and the first days shall be lost because his separation was made unclean.
content_old: 12 Then shall he separate unto Yahweh his days of separation, and shall bring in a he-lamb a year old､ as a guilt-bearer,—and the first days shall be lost because his separation was made unclean.

content: 13 And this is the law of the Separate One, on the day when he fulfilleth his days of separation, he shall be brought in unto the entrance of the tent of meeting:
content_old: 13 And this is the law of the Separate One, on the day when he fulfilleth his days of separation, he shall be brought in unto the entrance of the tent of meeting:

content: 14 then shall he bring near､ as his offering unto Yahweh､—one he-lamb a year old､ without defect､ for an ascending-sacrifice, and one ewelamb a year old､ without defect､ for a sin-bearer,—and one ram､ without defect､ for a peace-offering;
content_old: 14 then shall he bring near､ as his offering unto Yahweh､—one he-lamb a year old､ without defect､ for an ascending-sacrifice, and one ewelamb a year old､ without defect､ for a sin-bearer,—and one ram､ without defect､ for a peace-offering;

content: 15 and a basket of unleavened cakes—fine meal in round cakes overflowed with oil, and thin cakes of unleavened bread､ anointed with oil,—with their meal-offering and their drink-offerings.
content_old: 15 and a basket of unleavened cakes—fine meal in round cakes overflowed with oil, and thin cakes of unleavened bread､ anointed with oil,—with their meal-offering and their drink-offerings.

content: 16 Then shall the priest bring them near before Yahweh,—and offer his sin-bearer､ and his ascending-sacrifice;
content_old: 16 Then shall the priest bring them near before Yahweh,—and offer his sin-bearer､ and his ascending-sacrifice;

content: 17 and the ram shall he offer as a peace-offering unto Yahweh, besides the basket of unleavened cakes,—and the priest shall offer the meal-offering thereof､ and the drink-offering thereof.
content_old: 17 and the ram shall he offer as a peace-offering unto Yahweh, besides the basket of unleavened cakes,—and the priest shall offer the meal-offering thereof､ and the drink-offering thereof.

content: 18 Then shall the Separate One shave､ at the entrance of the tent of meeting､ his head of separation,—and take the hair of his head of separation, and put upon the fire, which is under the peace-offering.
content_old: 18 Then shall the Separate One shave､ at the entrance of the tent of meeting､ his head of separation,—and take the hair of his head of separation, and put upon the fire, which is under the peace-offering.

content: 19 Then shall the priest take the shoulder for boiling from the ram, and one unleavened round cake from the basket, and one unleavened thin cake,—and place them on the hands of the Separate One after he hath shaven off his hair of separation;
content_old: 19 Then shall the priest take the shoulder for boiling from the ram, and one unleavened round cake from the basket, and one unleavened thin cake,—and place them on the hands of the Separate One after he hath shaven off his hair of separation;

content: 20 and the priest shall wave them as a wave-offering before Yahweh, hallowed it is for the priest, besides the wave breast, and besides the heave leg,—and afterwards may the Separate One drink wine.
content_old: 20 and the priest shall wave them as a wave-offering before Yahweh, hallowed it is for the priest, besides the wave breast, and besides the heave leg,—and afterwards may the Separate One drink wine.

content: 21 This is the law of One Separate､ what he shall vow, his offering unto Yahweh with respect to his separation, besides what his hand may obtain: as required by the vow that he shall vow so must he do, with respect to the law of his separation.
content_old: 21 This is the law of One Separate､ what he shall vow, his offering unto Yahweh with respect to his separation, besides what his hand may obtain: as required by the vow that he shall vow so must he do, with respect to the law of his separation.

content: 22 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 22 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:

content: 23 Speak unto Aaron､ and unto his sons､ saying, Thus shall ye bless the sons of Israel,—saying unto them:
content_old: 23 Speak unto Aaron､ and unto his sons､ saying, Thus shall ye bless the sons of Israel,—saying unto them:

content: 24 Yahweh bless thee､ and keep thee:
content_old: 24 Yahweh bless thee､ and keep thee:

content: 25 Yahweh cause his face to shine upon thee､ and be gracious unto thee:
content_old: 25 Yahweh cause his face to shine upon thee､ and be gracious unto thee:

content: 26 Yahweh lift up his face unto thee, and appoint unto thee､ peace.
content_old: 26 Yahweh lift up his face unto thee, and appoint unto thee､ peace.

content: 1 And it came to pass on the day when Moses made an end of rearing up the habitation､ and anointing it､ and hallowing it､ and all the furniture thereof, and the altar, and all the utensils thereof,—both of anointing them､ and hallowing them
content_old: 1 And it came to pass on the day when Moses made an end of rearing up the habitation､ and anointing it､ and hallowing it､ and all the furniture thereof, and the altar, and all the utensils thereof,—both of anointing them､ and hallowing them

content: 2 that the princes of Israel, the heads of their ancestral houses made an offering,—they being princes of the tribes, they being the men who stood over them who were numbered:
content_old: 2 that the princes of Israel, the heads of their ancestral houses made an offering,—they being princes of the tribes, they being the men who stood over them who were numbered:

content: 3 yea､ then brought they in､ as their offering､ before Yahweh—six covered waggons､ and twelve oxen, a waggon for every two of the princes､ and an ox for each one,—yea they brought them near before the habitation.
content_old: 3 yea､ then brought they in､ as their offering､ before Yahweh—six covered waggons､ and twelve oxen, a waggon for every two of the princes､ and an ox for each one,—yea they brought them near before the habitation.

content: 4 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 4 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses､ saying:

content: 5 Take them of them, so shall they be for doing the laborious work of the tent of meeting,—and thou shalt give them unto the Levites, to every man according to the need of his laborious work.
content_old: 5 Take them of them, so shall they be for doing the laborious work of the tent of meeting,—and thou shalt give them unto the Levites, to every man according to the need of his laborious work.

content: 6 So Moses took the waggons､ and the oxen,—and gave them unto the Levites:
content_old: 6 So Moses took the waggons､ and the oxen,—and gave them unto the Levites:

content: 7 two of the waggons and four of the oxen gave he unto the sons of Gershon,—according to the need of their laborious work;
content_old: 7 two of the waggons and four of the oxen gave he unto the sons of Gershon,—according to the need of their laborious work;

content: 8 and four of the waggons､ and eight of the oxen gave he unto the sons of Merari,—according to the need of their laborious work, in the hand of Ithamar son of Aaron the priest;
content_old: 8 and four of the waggons､ and eight of the oxen gave he unto the sons of Merari,—according to the need of their laborious work, in the hand of Ithamar son of Aaron the priest;

content: 9 but unto the sons of Kohath gave he none,—because as to the laborious work of the sanctuary which pertained unto them upon their shoulders were they to carry it.
content_old: 9 but unto the sons of Kohath gave he none,—because as to the laborious work of the sanctuary which pertained unto them upon their shoulders were they to carry it.

content: 10 So then the princes offered for the dedication of the altar, on the day it was anointed,—yea the princes offered their oblation before the altar.
content_old: 10 So then the princes offered for the dedication of the altar, on the day it was anointed,—yea the princes offered their oblation before the altar.

content: 11 And Yahweh said unto Moses: Each prince on his appointed day thus shall they offer their oblation, for the dedication of the altar.
content_old: 11 And Yahweh said unto Moses: Each prince on his appointed day thus shall they offer their oblation, for the dedication of the altar.

content: 12 And so it was､ that he who on the first day offered his oblation,—was Nahshôn son of Amminadab､ of the tribe of Judah;
content_old: 12 And so it was､ that he who on the first day offered his oblation,—was Nahshôn son of Amminadab､ of the tribe of Judah;

content: 13 and his offering was—one charger of silver､a hundred and thirty shekels the weight thereof, one tossing bowl､ of silver, seventy shekels､ by the shekel of the sanctuary,—both of them full of fine meal overflowed with oil､ for a meal-offering;
content_old: 13 and his offering was—one charger of silver､a hundred and thirty shekels the weight thereof, one tossing bowl､ of silver, seventy shekels､ by the shekel of the sanctuary,—both of them full of fine meal overflowed with oil､ for a meal-offering;

content: 14 one spoon of ten shekels of gold､ full of incense;
content_old: 14 one spoon of ten shekels of gold､ full of incense;

content: 15 one choice young bullock､ one ram､ one he-lamb of the first year､ as an ascending-sacrifice;

content: 16 one young he-goat､ as a sin-bearer;

content: 17 and as a peace-offering two oxen, five rams､ five he-goats, five he-lambs of the first year,—this was the offering of Nashôn､ son of Amminadab.
content_old: 17 and as a peace-offering two oxen, five rams､ five he-goats, five he-lambs of the first year,—this was the offering of Nashôn､ son of Amminadab.

content: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:
content_old: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying:

content: 2 Speak unto Aaron, and thou shalt say unto him,— When thou lightest up the lamps over against the front of the lampstand shall the seven lamps give light.
content_old: 2 Speak unto Aaron, and thou shalt say unto him,— When thou lightest up the lamps over against the front of the lampstand shall the seven lamps give light.

content: 3 And Aaron did so, over against the front of the lampstand lighted he up the lamps thereof,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.
content_old: 3 And Aaron did so, over against the front of the lampstand lighted he up the lamps thereof,— As Yahweh commanded Moses.

content: 4 Now this was the work of the lampstand—beaten work of gold both in the shaft thereof and in the flowers thereof was it beaten work according to the appearance which Yahweh caused to appear unto Moses so made he the lampstand.
content_old: 4 Now this was the work of the lampstand—beaten work of gold both in the shaft thereof and in the flowers thereof was it beaten work according to the appearance which Yahweh caused to appear unto Moses so made he the lampstand.

content: 5 And Yahweh spake unto Moses, saying:
content_old: 5 And Yahweh spake unto Moses, saying:

content: 6 Take the Levites, out of the midst of the sons of Israel,—and thou shalt purify them.
content_old: 6 Take the Levites, out of the midst of the sons of Israel,—and thou shalt purify them.

content: 7 And thus shalt thou do unto them､ to purify them, sprinkle upon them sin-cleansing water,—then shall they cause a razor to pass over all their flesh, and shall wash their clothes､ and so make themselves pure.
content_old: 7 And thus shalt thou do unto them､ to purify them, sprinkle upon them sin-cleansing water,—then shall they cause a razor to pass over all their flesh, and shall wash their clothes､ and so make themselves pure.

content: 8 Then shall they take a choice young bullock, with the meal-offering thereof､ even fine meal overflowed with oil,—and a second choice young bullock shalt thou take､ as a sin-bearer.
content_old: 8 Then shall they take a choice young bullock, with the meal-offering thereof､ even fine meal overflowed with oil,—and a second choice young bullock shalt thou take､ as a sin-bearer.

content: 9 Then shalt thou bring the Levites near､ before the tent of meeting,—and shalt call together all the assembly of the sons of Israel;
content_old: 9 Then shalt thou bring the Levites near､ before the tent of meeting,—and shalt call together all the assembly of the sons of Israel;

content: 10 and shalt bring the Levites near before Yahweh,—and the sons of Israel shall lean their hands upon the Levites;
content_old: 10 and shalt bring the Levites near before Yahweh,—and the sons of Israel shall lean their hands upon the Levites;

content: 11 and Aaron shall offer the Levites､ as a wave-offering before Yahweh, from among the sons of Israel,—so shall they be for performing the laborious work of Yahweh.
content_old: 11 and Aaron shall offer the Levites､ as a wave-offering before Yahweh, from among the sons of Israel,—so shall they be for performing the laborious work of Yahweh.

content: 12 And the Levites shall lean their hands upon the head of the bullocks; then make thou of the one a sin-bearer､ and of the other an ascending-sacrifice unto Yahweh, to put a propitiatory-covering over the Levites.
content_old: 12 And the Levites shall lean their hands upon the head of the bullocks; then make thou of the one a sin-bearer､ and of the other an ascending-sacrifice unto Yahweh, to put a propitiatory-covering over the Levites.

content: 13 Thus shalt thou cause the Levites to stand before Aaron､ and before his sons,—thus shalt thou offer them as a wave-offering unto Yahweh;
content_old: 13 Thus shalt thou cause the Levites to stand before Aaron､ and before his sons,—thus shalt thou offer them as a wave-offering unto Yahweh;

content: 14 thus shalt thou separate the Levites out of the midst of the sons of Israel,—thus shall the Levites become mine.
content_old: 14 thus shalt thou separate the Levites out of the midst of the sons of Israel,—thus shall the Levites become mine.

content: 15 And after that shall the Levites enter to do the labour of the tent of meeting,—so shalt thou purify them, and offer them as a wave-offering.
content_old: 15 And after that shall the Levites enter to do the labour of the tent of meeting,—so shalt thou purify them, and offer them as a wave-offering.

content: 16 For given､ given they are unto me, out of the midst of the sons of Israel,—instead of every firstborn that a mother beareth from among the sons of Israel have I taken them unto me.
content_old: 16 For given､ given they are unto me, out of the midst of the sons of Israel,—instead of every firstborn that a mother beareth from among the sons of Israel have I taken them unto me.

content: 17 For mine is every firstborn､ among the sons of Israel, among men､ and among beasts,—on the day when I smote every firstborn in the land of Egypt did I hallow them unto me.
content_old: 17 For mine is every firstborn､ among the sons of Israel, among men､ and among beasts,—on the day when I smote every firstborn in the land of Egypt did I hallow them unto me.

content: 18 Therefore have I taken the Levites,—instead of every firstborn among the sons of Israel;
content_old: 18 Therefore have I taken the Levites,—instead of every firstborn among the sons of Israel;

content: 19 therefore have I given the Levites､ as a gift unto Aaron and unto his sons､ out of the midst of the sons of Israel, to do the laborious work of the sons of Israel､ in the tent of meeting, and to put a propitiatory-covering over the sons of Israel,—so shall there be､ among the sons of Israel､ no plague, by the coming nigh of the sons of Israel unto the sanctuary.
content_old: 19 therefore have I given the Levites､ as a gift unto Aaron and unto his sons､ out of the midst of the sons of Israel, to do the laborious work of the sons of Israel､ in the tent of meeting, and to put a propitiatory-covering over the sons of Israel,—so shall there be､ among the sons of Israel､ no plague, by the coming nigh of the sons of Israel unto the sanctuary.

content: 20 And Moses and Aaron and all the assembly of the sons of Israel did thus unto the Levites,—according to all that Yahweh commanded Moses as touching the Levites so did the sons of Israel unto them.
content_old: 20 And Moses and Aaron and all the assembly of the sons of Israel did thus unto the Levites,—according to all that Yahweh commanded Moses as touching the Levites so did the sons of Israel unto them.

content: 21 And the Levites accepted the cleansing from sin､ and washed their clothes, and Aaron offered them as a wave-offering before Yahweh,—and Aaron put a propitiatory-covering over them､ to make them pure.
content_old: 21 And the Levites accepted the cleansing from sin､ and washed their clothes, and Aaron offered them as a wave-offering before Yahweh,—and Aaron put a propitiatory-covering over them､ to make them pure.

content: 22 And after that went the Levites in､ to do their laborious work in the tent of meeting, before Aaron､ and before his sons,—as Yahweh commanded Moses concerning the Levites so did they unto them.
content_old: 22 And after that went the Levites in､ to do their laborious work in the tent of meeting, before Aaron､ and before his sons,—as Yahweh commanded Moses concerning the Levites so did they unto them.

content: 23 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying;
content_old: 23 And Yahweh spake unto Moses､ saying;

content: 24 This is what concerneth the Levites,—from twenty-five years old and upwards shall they enter to take rank in the host, for doing the laborious work of the tent of meeting;
content_old: 24 This is what concerneth the Levites,—from twenty-five years old and upwards shall they enter to take rank in the host, for doing the laborious work of the tent of meeting;

content: 25 but from the age of fifty years shall they retire from taking rank in the labour, and shall do laborious work no more;
content_old: 25 but from the age of fifty years shall they retire from taking rank in the labour, and shall do laborious work no more;

content: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses in the desert of Sinai､ in the second year by their coming forth out of the land of Egypt､ in the first month､ saying:
content_old: 1 And Yahweh spake unto Moses in the desert of Sinai､ in the second year by their coming forth out of the land of Egypt､ in the first month､ saying:

content: 2 Let the sons of Israel､ therefore､ keep the passover､ in its appointed season:
content_old: 2 Let the sons of Israel､ therefore､ keep the passover､ in its appointed season:

content: 3 on the fourteenth day of this month､ between the two evenings shall ye keep it､ in its appointed season,—according to all the statutes thereof､ and according to all the regulations thereof shall ye keep it.
content_old: 3 on the fourteenth day of this month､ between the two evenings shall ye keep it､ in its appointed season,—according to all the statutes thereof､ and according to all the regulations thereof shall ye keep it.

content: 4 Then spake Moses unto the sons of Israel､ that they should keep the passover.
content_old: 4 Then spake Moses unto the sons of Israel､ that they should keep the passover.

content: 5 So they kept the passover､ in the first month ､ on the fourteenth day of the month､ between the two evenings､ in the desert of Sinai,—according to all that Yahweh commanded Moses so did the sons of Israel.
content_old: 5 So they kept the passover､ in the first month ､ on the fourteenth day of the month､ between the two evenings､ in the desert of Sinai,—according to all that Yahweh commanded Moses so did the sons of Israel.

content: 6 But so it was､ that there were certain men who had become unclean､ by a dead person, and could not keep the passover on that day,—therefore came they near､ before Moses and before Aaron､ On that day.
content_old: 6 But so it was､ that there were certain men who had become unclean､ by a dead person, and could not keep the passover on that day,—therefore came they near､ before Moses and before Aaron､ On that day.

content: 7 Then said those men unto him, We are unclean by a dead person,—wherefore should we become of less esteem､ for want of offering the oblation of Yahweh in its appointed season, in the midst of the sons of Israel?
content_old: 7 Then said those men unto him, We are unclean by a dead person,—wherefore should we become of less esteem､ for want of offering the oblation of Yahweh in its appointed season, in the midst of the sons of Israel?

content: 8 And Moses said unto them,— Stay, and let me hear, what Yahweh shall command concerning you!
content_old: 8 And Moses said unto them,— Stay, and let me hear, what Yahweh shall command concerning you!

content: 9 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses, saying:
content_old: 9 Then spake Yahweh unto Moses, saying:

content: 10 Speak unto the sons of Israel､ saying,— Though any man be unclean by a dead person､ or be on a journey afar off､ whether in the case of yourselves or of your generations yet shall he keep a passover unto Yahweh.
content_old: 10 Speak unto the sons of Israel､ saying,— Though any man be unclean by a dead person､ or be on a journey afar off､ whether in the case of yourselves or of your generations yet shall he keep a passover unto Yahweh.

content: 11 In the second month､ on the fourteenth day between the two evenings shall they keep it,—with unleavened cakes and bitter herbs shall they eat it.
content_old: 11 In the second month､ on the fourteenth day between the two evenings shall they keep it,—with unleavened cakes and bitter herbs shall they eat it.

content: 12 They shall not leave thereof until morning, and no bone shall they break therein—according to all the statutes of the passover shall they keep it.
content_old: 12 They shall not leave thereof until morning, and no bone shall they break therein—according to all the statutes of the passover shall they keep it.

content: 13 But as for the man who is clean､ and no a journey doth not chance to be､ and yet faileth to keep the passover that person shall be cut off from among his kinsfolk,—for the oblation of Yahweh hath he not offered in its appointed season, his own sin shall that man bear.
content_old: 13 But as for the man who is clean､ and no a journey doth not chance to be､ and yet faileth to keep the passover that person shall be cut off from among his kinsfolk,—for the oblation of Yahweh hath he not offered in its appointed season, his own sin shall that man bear.

content: 14 When､ moreover､ there may sojourn with you a sojourner, who would keep a passover unto Yahweh according to the statute of the passover､ and according to the regulation thereof so must he keep it,—one statute shall there be for you, both for the sojourner､ and for the native of the land.
content_old: 14 When､ moreover､ there may sojourn with you a sojourner, who would keep a passover unto Yahweh according to the statute of the passover､ and according to the regulation thereof so must he keep it,—one statute shall there be for you, both for the sojourner､ and for the native of the land.

content: 15 Now on the day the habitation was reared the cloud covered the habitation, even the tent of the testimony,—and in the evening it was over the habitation､ like an appearance of fire､ until morning.
content_old: 15 Now on the day the habitation was reared the cloud covered the habitation, even the tent of the testimony,—and in the evening it was over the habitation､ like an appearance of fire､ until morning.

content: 16 Thus came it to pass continually, the cloud covered it,—and an appearance of fire､ by night;
content_old: 16 Thus came it to pass continually, the cloud covered it,—and an appearance of fire､ by night;

content: 17 but at the bidding of the upgoings of the cloud from off the tent then after that the sons of Israel set forward,—and in the place where the cloud abode there the sons of Israel encamped:
content_old: 17 but at the bidding of the upgoings of the cloud from off the tent then after that the sons of Israel set forward,—and in the place where the cloud abode there the sons of Israel encamped:

content: 18 at the bidding of Yahweh the sons of Israel set forward, and at the bidding of Yahweh they encamped,—all the days that the cloud abode upon the habitation they remained encamped.
content_old: 18 at the bidding of Yahweh the sons of Israel set forward, and at the bidding of Yahweh they encamped,—all the days that the cloud abode upon the habitation they remained encamped.

content: 19 And when the cloud lengthened out its stay upon the habitation､ many days then would the sons of Israel keep the watch of Yahweh､ and would not set forward.
content_old: 19 And when the cloud lengthened out its stay upon the habitation､ many days then would the sons of Israel keep the watch of Yahweh､ and would not set forward.

content: 20 And so it was when the cloud would be a few days upon the habitation at the bidding of Yahweh they remained encamped, and at the bidding of Yahweh they set forward.
content_old: 20 And so it was when the cloud would be a few days upon the habitation at the bidding of Yahweh they remained encamped, and at the bidding of Yahweh they set forward.

content: 21 And so it was when the cloud would be from evening until morning as soon as the cloud went up in the morning so soon did they set forward: whether by day or by night as soon as the cloud went up so soon did they set forward.
